Package com.vsta.quartz

Class QuartzSheduler

java.lang.Object
com.vsta.quartz.QuartzSheduler
@Configuration
public class QuartzSheduler
extends java.lang.Object
This class contains all the methods required for setting up and controlling of Quartz job.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    QuartzSheduler()  

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    org.quartz.JobDetail getJobDetail​(java.lang.Class<? extends org.quartz.Job> jobType)
    Getter method to retrieve job details for any job type.
    org.quartz.CronTrigger getTrigger​(org.quartz.JobDetail job, java.lang.String interval)
    Getter method to retrieve job trigger.
    org.quartz.JobDetail jobADetails()
    Getter method to retrieve job details for only Quartz Job.
    org.quartz.CronTrigger jobATrigger​(org.quartz.JobDetail job)
    This method defines, builds and return the job trigger.
    java.util.Properties quartzProperties()
    This method loads variables inside the quartz.properties file.
    org.quartz.Scheduler scheduler​(org.quartz.Trigger trigger, org.quartz.JobDetail job, org.springframework.scheduling.quartz.SchedulerFactoryBean factory)
    The Scheduler is used to register quartz jobs and trigger.
    org.springframework.scheduling.quartz.SchedulerFactoryBean schedulerFactoryBean()
    Spring's SchedulerFactoryBean provides bean-style usage for configuring a Scheduler, manages its life-cycle within the application context, and exposes the Scheduler as a bean for dependency injection.
    org.springframework.scheduling.quartz.SpringBeanJobFactory springBeanJobFactory()
    Uses AutoWiringSpringBeanJobFactory class to inject quartz objects such as scheduler context, job data map, and trigger data entries as properties from applicationContext into the job bean while creating an instance.

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Constructor Details

    • QuartzSheduler

      public QuartzSheduler()

  • Method Details

    • springBeanJobFactory

      @Bean public org.springframework.scheduling.quartz.SpringBeanJobFactory springBeanJobFactory()
      Uses AutoWiringSpringBeanJobFactory class to inject quartz objects such as scheduler context, job data map, and trigger data entries as properties from applicationContext into the job bean while creating an instance.
      Returns:
      SpringBeanJobFactory to be used to inject properties for job.

    • scheduler

      @Bean public org.quartz.Scheduler scheduler​(org.quartz.Trigger trigger, org.quartz.JobDetail job, org.springframework.scheduling.quartz.SchedulerFactoryBean factory) throws org.quartz.SchedulerException
      The Scheduler is used to register quartz jobs and trigger. Once registered, the jobs can be executed based on the trigger.
      Parameters:
      trigger - Trigger object that will trigger the execution of the job
      job - JobDetail object that contains the details properties of a Job instance.
      factory - SchedulerFactoryBean object.
      Returns:
      Scheduler object.
      Throws:
      org.quartz.SchedulerException - Exception if any is thrown.

    • schedulerFactoryBean

      @Bean public org.springframework.scheduling.quartz.SchedulerFactoryBean schedulerFactoryBean() throws java.io.IOException
      Spring's SchedulerFactoryBean provides bean-style usage for configuring a Scheduler, manages its life-cycle within the application context, and exposes the Scheduler as a bean for dependency injection. Taken from baeldung.
      Returns:
      SchedulerFactoryBean object.
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - Exception if any is thrown.

    • quartzProperties

      public java.util.Properties quartzProperties() throws java.io.IOException
      This method loads variables inside the quartz.properties file.
      Returns:
      Properties for the quartz job such as API key and URL.
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - Exception if any is thrown.

    • jobADetails

      @Bean public org.quartz.JobDetail jobADetails()
      Getter method to retrieve job details for only Quartz Job. Calls the JobBuilder method from Quartz Scheduler to create a JobBuilder, containing the job details and the class name of the Job to be executed. The JobBuilder is then built and produced JobDetail.
      Returns:
      JobDetail contains the details properties of a Job instance.

    • jobATrigger

      @Bean public org.quartz.CronTrigger jobATrigger​(org.quartz.JobDetail job)
      This method defines, builds and return the job trigger.
      Parameters:
      job - contains the details properties of a Job instance.
      Returns:
      Trigger object that will trigger the execution of the job.

    • getTrigger

      public org.quartz.CronTrigger getTrigger​(org.quartz.JobDetail job, java.lang.String interval)
      Getter method to retrieve job trigger. This method allows for custom interval.
      Parameters:
      job - contains the details properties of a Job instance.
      interval - String representing the job interval.
      Returns:
      Trigger object that will trigger the execution of the job.

    • getJobDetail

      public org.quartz.JobDetail getJobDetail​(java.lang.Class<? extends org.quartz.Job> jobType)
      Getter method to retrieve job details for any job type. Similar to jobADetails() method, it calls the JobBuilder method from Quartz Scheduler to create a JobBuilder which is then built and produced JobDetail.
      Parameters:
      jobType - type of job to be executed.
      Returns:
      JobDetail contains the details properties of a Job instance.
